data.eml:eml: Redescription of the genus Cheleocloeon Wuillot & Gillies 1993 (Ephemeroptera: Baetidae) with descriptions of three new species from Zambia and Uganda

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kluge, Nikita J. (2016): Redescription of the genus Cheleocloeon Wuillot & Gillies 1993 (Ephemeroptera: Baetidae) with descriptions of three new species from Zambia and Uganda. Zootaxa 4067 (2): 135-167, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4067.2.2
